fields.description:
User would like the ability to hide the subtitle icon when using mediaControlStyle: 
Titanium.Media.VIDEO_CONTROL_DEFAULT
Titanium.Media.VIDEO_CONTROL_EMBEDDED
Titanium.Media.VIDEO_CONTROL_VOLUME_ONLY
Currently when using these control style the subtitle icon appears. (please see screenshot attached)
h6. feature request
ability to use the mediaControlStyle in Titanium.Media and to hide the subtitle icon
fields.summary: Titanium.Media: Hide subtitle icon when using mediaControlStyle

comments.body: The subtitle menu is shown / hidden based on the users device setting and cannot manually be turned off, since it's an important accessibility feature iOS users when presenting video. See [this|http://stackoverflow.com/questions/20352480/hide-subtitles-menu-from-mpmoviecontrol-in-ios-7] and [this|http://stackoverflow.com/questions/20352480/hide-subtitles-menu-from-mpmoviecontrol-in-ios-7] discussion for more infos.
Closing ticket as this is not our bug.
